Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Value
Synopsis Values of type value.
Types value
Details Conditional Equal GreaterThan GreaterThanOrEqual LessThan LessThanOrEqual NotEqual
Description Value stands for all possible Rascal values and is represented by the type value. This type is a container for all other types and does not have any values itself.

The following functions are provided for values:
  • Conditional: Conditional expression on values.
  • Equal: Equal operator on values.
  • GreaterThan: Greater than operator on values.
  • GreaterThanOrEqual: Greater than or equal operator on values.
  • LessThan: Less than operator on values.
  • LessThanOrEqual: Less than or equal operator on values.
  • NotEqual: Not equal operator on values.
